abstract: Iran reports Abdolrasoul Dorri Esfahani, bank adviser who helped broker nuclear deal, has been arrested on suspicion of espionage and released on bail; disclosure may reflect leadership’s frustration over failure of deal to bring promised economic benefits.
lead_paragraph: The disclosure appeared to be the latest sign of the Iranian leadership’s frustration over the deal, which has failed to yield significant economic benefits.
snippet: The disclosure appeared to be the latest sign of the Iranian leadership’s frustration over the deal, which has failed to yield significant economic benefits....

headline.main: Iran Arrests Person Linked to Negotiations on Nuclear Deal
headline.print_headline: Iran Arrests Person Linked to Negotiations on Its Nuclear Deal
